synonyms.synonym: Rho/Rac guanine nucleotide exchange factor FGD1

protein.general_function: Involved in Rho guanyl-nucleotide exchange factor activity
protein.specific_function: Activates CDC42, a member of the Ras-like family of Rho- and Rac proteins, by exchanging bound GDP for free GTP. Plays a role in regulating the actin cytoskeleton and cell shape

go_class.description: regulation of small gtpase mediated signal transduction
regulation of ras protein signal transduction
regulation of rho protein signal transduction
